title: Protein BRCA1 as a stress coach

title_detail.value: Protein BRCA1 as a stress coach

summary: Two proteins work hand in hand to ensure that the tumor cells of neuroblastoma can grow at full speed. A research team shows how the proteins can do this.

summary_detail.value: Two proteins work hand in hand to ensure that the tumor cells of neuroblastoma can grow at full speed. A research team shows how the proteins can do this.
